name: Welcome to Tollington
description:
Explore a quirky town!

  • get some milk before the end of the day
  • talk to the townsfolk for guidance
  • point and click style adventure

Controls

  • use the arrow keys or WASD to move around
  • press E to start and progress conversations 

Tips

  • some characters have a lot to say
  • try speaking to different characters at different stages of your quest

Game-A-Month-Athon 11/12

This project was created as part of the Ruddy Good GAMA, where I've set out to create a bite-size experimental game each month! 

 May 2022
